name: Frank (Pedro Salas, Ivo Pfaffen)
description:
Frank loves plants. Frank can go through walls, and will eat your oxygen plants if he comes across one. Frank can survive in the wild in planet Gallina, you can't.

Protect and water your oxygen plants while solving puzzles to enter the escape pod and leave planet Gallina.

There are lots of Franks, beware of them.

Frank.

Controls: 

-  WASD or arrows to move.

- Space to jump.

- E to interact.

-Q to pause.

Programming and original art by Pedro Salas & Ivo Pfaffen

Pedro Salas:  https://pedro-salas.itch.io/ | Ivo Pfaffen: www.ivopfaffen.com
